module.name: interactionManager
module.description: This module is responsible for supervising the interaction among all modules involved in the assistive rehab demo.
module.copypolicy: Released under the terms of the BSD 3-Clause License.

param.desc: Configuration file name for the speak.
User engaged within this field of view (degrees).
If true, the user has to move the opposite arm with respect to the robot.

input.description: Receives the score associated to the performed exercise. To be connected to /feedbackSynthetizer/score:o.

output.description: Sends commands to \ref attentionManager to redirect the robot's gaze toward the engaged user.
Sends commands to \ref motionAnalyzer for starting/stopping the real-time motion analysis.
Sends commands to \ref iSpeak to wait until the sentence is spoken.
Streams out the verbal interaction. To be connected to \ref iSpeak.
